pages.text: $(li)Flares are flying creatures that does not summon normally.$(br)$(li)You have to hit a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/phantom)Phantom$(/l) with a Splash $(l:patchouli:potions/upgrade_aquatic/insomnia)Potion of Insomnia$(/l) or with an $(l)Arrow of Insomnia$() to transform it into a Flare.$(br)$(li)These creatures will attack $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/phantom)Phantoms$(/l), so you can use them to defend your base of those annoying creatures.
Flares may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/phantom_membrane)Phantom Membranes$(/l) on death.
